name: Rommanager-addictions
body:
### How to add your rom First you have to add your rom's name to rom.xml Then you have to create a .xml file which will contain info about your rom. The template looks like this: https://github.com/jereksel/RomManager-addictions/blob/master/template.xml.template So,
you have to replace:
THREAD_URL with your rom url ie. http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=2555021
AUTHOR_NAME with your nick
Now we'll add release data
Every release starts with `rom` and ends with `/rom`
Between `name` and `/name` you have to add release name: http://oi58.tinypic.com/1on5mo.jpg
Between `download` `/download` you have to add download url
Between `changelog` `/changelog` you have to add changelog of this release
IMPORTANT NOTE: for newline add ` ` EVEN MORE IMPORTANT NOTE: this .xml name should looks like this: YouRomNameInLowerCase.xml ie. If you add AOSPA your .xml file should be aospa.xml Then you have to start pack.sh script, push and do pull request. Then Travis will check if your pull request is fine.
Example of bad commit: https://github.com/jereksel/RomManager-addictions/pull/6
Example of good commit: https://github.com/jereksel/RomManager-addictions/pull/7
If you are sure you've done everything fine and you still got Travis build error contact me. If you have questions/suggestions contact me: jereksel[at]gmail[dot]com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
